assignments.description: only when record is created assign default values to field
assignments.name: Assign_Default_Values
assignments.label: Assign Default Values

assignments.description: when condition match update all listing agent field from Record. Owner(user) .
assignments.name: Assign_from_Owner_user
assignments.label: Assign from Owner(user)

assignments.description: When condition match then assign default values to the field.
assignments.name: Assign_Lost_Reason_Status_System_Allowed_Portal
assignments.label: Assign Lost Reason, Status, System Allowed Portal

assignments.description: update all fields with assign value
assignments.name: LastPrice_ChangedOn
assignments.label: LastPrice ChangedOn

assignments.description: when condition match then update "Exclusive Listing Date" filed with current date and time.
assignments.name: ListingExclusivity_date
assignments.label: ListingExclusivity date

decisions.description: When listing Record is created condition is match then we update listing object field name is "country" ,"Zip Postal Code", "state ".(PB:-Country / Postal Code / State Default value)
decisions.name: check_Country_Postal_Code_State
decisions.label: Check Country / Postal Code / State

rules.name: Country_Postal_Code_State_Default_value
rules.label: Country / Postal Code / State Default value

decisions.description: When listing Record is created and edited condition is match then we update listing object field name is "Exclusive listing date" .(Exclusive Listing Date)
decisions.name: check_Is_Listing_Exclusive
decisions.label: Check Is Listing Exclusive

decisions.description: When listing Record is created and edited condition is match then we update listing object field name is "Listing price change on, listing price changed by, listing price expiry".(Listing Price Updates)
decisions.name: check_Listing_price_is_changed
decisions.label: Check Listing price is changed

decisions.description: When listing Record is created and edited condition is match then we update listing object field update record.(PB:-Copy user details from user obj to listings)
decisions.name: check_listing_status
decisions.label: Check listing status

rules.name: If_listing_status_is_active_or_published
rules.label: If listing status is active or published

decisions.description: When listing Record is created and edited condition is match then we update listing object field name is listing type initial is sale = s and Rent = R (Listing type Initial)
decisions.name: check_Listing_type
decisions.label: Check Listing type

decisions.description: When listing Record is created or edited ,"listing verified by cc = true" condition is match then we update listing object field name is listing verify date.(Listing Verified Date)
decisions.name: check_Listing_verified_by_cc
decisions.label: Check Listing verified by cc

decisions.description: When listing Record is created and edited condition is match then we update listing object field name property type.(Populate Property type fields)
decisions.name: check_populate_property_type_field
decisions.label: Check populate property type field

decisions.description: When listing Record is created and edited condition is match then we Copy user details from user object to listings(Property Finder Field Mapping - Existing Listing)
decisions.name: check_Property_Finder_Existing_Listing
decisions.label: Check Property Finder Existing Listing

decisions.description: When listing Record is created condtion is match then we Copy user details from user object to listings.(Property Finder Field Mapping - New Listing )
decisions.name: check_Property_Finder_New_Listing
decisions.label: Check Property Finder New Listing

decisions.description: When listing Record is created and edited condition is match then we update listing object field name is "Lost reason, status, system allowed portal".(Form A Expiry > Status to Lost)
decisions.name: check_Status
decisions.label: Check Status

rules.name: Published
rules.conditionLogic: (5 AND 1 AND 2 AND 6) OR ( 1 AND 3 AND 2 AND 6) OR (2 AND 4 AND 1 AND 6) OR(1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 6)
rules.label: Published

rules.name: Status_Draft_sold_rented
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND ( 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Status-Draft,Sold,Rented

formulas.name: Cleanmobilephone
formulas.expression: IF ( Contains( {!$Record.Owner:User.MobilePhone} , ' ' ), SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Owner:User.MobilePhone}, " ", "" ), IF ( Contains( {!$Record.Owner:User.MobilePhone} , '+' ), SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Owner:User.MobilePhone} , "+", "" ), {!$Record.Owner:User.MobilePhone} ))

formulas.name: formulabucket
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(CONTAINS({!$Record.Listing_Inquiry_Recipient__r.UserRole.Name} , "DIFC Sales")) , IF(CONTAINS({!$Record.Listing_Inquiry_Recipient__r.UserRole.Name}, "Offplan Sales"), "Offplan", IF ( OR ( CONTAINS({!$Record.Listing_Inquiry_Recipient__r.UserRole.Name}, "Brokerage Sales"), CONTAINS({!$Record.Listing_Inquiry_Recipient__r.UserRole.Name}, "HERE Sales"), CONTAINS({!$Record.Listing_Inquiry_Recipient__r.UserRole.Name}, "SPF Sales") ) , "Brokerage", "Other") ) , "DIFC")

formulas.name: formulafield
formulas.expression: CASE( {!$Record.pba_uaefields__Property_Sub_Type__c}, "Residential - Apartment" , "Apartment" , "Residential - Bulk Units" , "Bulk Units" , "Residential - Bungalow" , "Bungalow" , "Residential - Chalet" , "Chalet" , "Residential - Compound" , "Compound" , "Residential - Duplex" , "Duplex" , "Residential - Full floor" , "Full floor" , "Residential - Half floor" , "Half floor" , "Residential - Labor Camp" , "Labor Camp" , "Residential - Land" , "Land" , "Residential - Penthouse" , "Penthouse" , "Residential - Townhouse" , "Townhouse" , "Residential - Triplex" , "Triplex" , "Residential - Villa" , "Villa" , "Residential - Whole Building" , "Whole Building" , "Commercial - Bulk Units" , "Bulk Units" , "Commercial - Factory" , "Factory" , "Commercial - Full floor" , "Full floor" , "Commercial - Half floor" , "Half floor" , "Commercial - Hotel Apartment" , "Hotel Apartment" , "Commercial - Labor Camp" , "Labor Camp" , "Commercial - Medical Facility" , "Medical Facility" , "Commercial - Office Space" , "Office Space" , "Commercial - Plot" , "Plot" , "Commercial - Restaurant" , "Restaurant" , "Commercial - Retail" , "Retail" , "Commercial - Shop" , "Shop" , "Commercial - Show Room" , "Show Room" , "Commercial - Staff Accommodation" , "Staff Accommodation" , "Commercial - Storage" , "Storage" , "Commercial - Store" , "Store" , "Commercial - Villa" , "Villa" , "Commercial - Warehouse" , "Warehouse" , "Commercial - Whole Building" , "Whole Building" , "None")

formulas.name: STATE
formulas.expression: IF( AND( TEXT({!$Record.CurrencyIsoCode}) = 'GBP', TEXT({!$Record.Sharing_Rule__c}) = 'United Kingdom SIR' ), {!$Record.pba__State_pb__c}, 'NA' )
